languages.text: "Мировой дух Лилэтан чует угрозу — и сопротивляется ей в меру своих сил. Живые формы, что населяют этот мир, становятся его оружием — оружием, направленным против мон-кай. Ядовитые растения, разъяренные звери — все это клинок в руке Лилэтан, что борется с явлением Сай'лантреш".

traits.locale_text: "Мировой дух Лилэтан чует угрозу — и сопротивляется ей в меру своих сил. Живые формы, что населяют этот мир, становятся его оружием — оружием, направленным против мон-кай. Ядовитые растения, разъяренные звери — все это клинок в руке Лилэтан, что борется с явлением Сай'лантреш".

languages.text: "The Lilaethan's World Spirit senses the threat — and resists as much as it is able. The living things that inhabit this world are becoming its weapons — weapons turned against the mon-keigh. Poisonous plants, rabid beasts — these are all like a blade in the Lilaethan's hand as she fights the coming of Sai'lanthresh."
languages.original_text: "Мировой дух Лилэтан чует угрозу — и сопротивляется ей в меру своих сил. Живые формы, что населяют этот мир, становятся его оружием — оружием, направленным против мон-кай. Ядовитые растения, разъяренные звери — все это клинок в руке Лилэтан, что борется с явлением Сай'лантреш".

The living things that inhabit this world are becoming its weapons — weapons turned against the mon-keigh. Poisonous plants, rabid beasts — these are all like a blade in the Lilaethan's hand as it fights the coming of Sai'lanthresh."

"The Lilaethan's world spirit senses the threat — and resists as much as it is able. The living things that inhabit this world are becoming its weapons — weapons turned against the mon-keigh. Poisonous plants, rabid beasts — these are all like a blade in the Lilaethan's hand as it fights the coming of Sai'lanthresh."

"The Lilaethan's world spirit senses the threat — and resists as much as it is able. The living things that inhabit this world are becoming its weapons — weapons turned against the mon-keigh. Poisonous plants, rabid beasts — these are all like a blade in the Lilaethan's hand as it fights the coming of Sai'lanthresh."

"The Lilaethan's world spirit senses the threat — and resists as much as it is able. The living things that inhabit this world are becoming its weapons — weapons turned against the mon-keigh. Poisonous plants, rabid beasts — these are all like a blade in the Lilaethan's hand as she fights the coming of Sai'lanthresh."

languages.text: 「リラエタンの世界の魂は脅威を感じとり…力の限り抵抗している。この星に住む生物は兵器になりつつある…モン＝ケイと敵対する兵器に。毒を持つ植物に、狂気に侵された獣…これらはすべて、セランスレッシュの襲来に抵抗する目的で、リラエタンが手にした刃のようなものなのだ」
languages.original_text: "The Lilaethan's World Spirit senses the threat — and resists as much as it is able. The living things that inhabit this world are becoming its weapons — weapons turned against the mon-keigh. Poisonous plants, rabid beasts — these are all like a blade in the Lilaethan's hand as she fights the coming of Sai'lanthresh."

traits.locale_text: 「リラエタンの世界の魂は脅威を感じとり…力の限り抵抗している。この星に住む生物は兵器になりつつある…モン＝ケイと敵対する兵器に。毒を持つ植物に、狂気に侵された獣…これらはすべて、セランスレッシュの襲来に抵抗する目的で、リラエタンが手にした刃のようなものなのだ」

languages.text: “莉莱赞的世界之魂感受到了这种威胁，此刻正在竭力反抗。居住在这个世界上的一切生物，都成了它的武器，用来对付猴子的武器。那些有毒的植物、还有狂暴的野兽，这一切都是莉莱赞手中的利刃，用来对抗赛·兰斯雷什的来袭。”
languages.original_text: "The Lilaethan's World Spirit senses the threat — and resists as much as it is able. The living things that inhabit this world are becoming its weapons — weapons turned against the mon-keigh. Poisonous plants, rabid beasts — these are all like a blade in the Lilaethan's hand as she fights the coming of Sai'lanthresh."

traits.locale_text: “莉莱赞的世界之魂感受到了这种威胁，此刻正在竭力反抗。居住在这个世界上的一切生物，都成了它的武器，用来对付猴子的武器。那些有毒的植物、还有狂暴的野兽，这一切都是莉莱赞手中的利刃，用来对抗赛·兰斯雷什的来袭。”

languages.text: «El espíritu del mundo del Lilaethan percibe la amenaza y resiste con todas sus fuerzas. Los seres vivos que habitan este planeta se convierten en sus armas, y esas armas se vuelven contra los mon-keigh. Plantas venenosas, bestias rabiosas... son como espadas en las manos del Lilaethan en su lucha por repeler a Sai'lanthresh».
languages.original_text: "The Lilaethan's World Spirit senses the threat — and resists as much as it is able. The living things that inhabit this world are becoming its weapons — weapons turned against the mon-keigh. Poisonous plants, rabid beasts — these are all like a blade in the Lilaethan's hand as she fights the coming of Sai'lanthresh."

traits.locale_text: «El espíritu del mundo del Lilaethan percibe la amenaza y resiste con todas sus fuerzas. Los seres vivos que habitan este planeta se convierten en sus armas, y esas armas se vuelven contra los mon-keigh. Plantas venenosas, bestias rabiosas... son como espadas en las manos del Lilaethan en su lucha por repeler a Sai'lanthresh».

languages.text: "Das Weltenbewusstsein von Lileath spürt die Bedrohung – und widersetzt sich nach Kräften. Die Lebewesen auf dieser Welt werden zu Waffen – Waffen gegen die Chem-Pan-Sey. Giftige Pflanzen, tollwütige Tiere – sie alle sind wie Klingen in Lileaths Hand, mit denen sie gegen das Kommen von Sai'lanthresh kämpft."
languages.original_text: "The Lilaethan's World Spirit senses the threat — and resists as much as it is able. The living things that inhabit this world are becoming its weapons — weapons turned against the mon-keigh. Poisonous plants, rabid beasts — these are all like a blade in the Lilaethan's hand as she fights the coming of Sai'lanthresh."

traits.locale_text: "Das Weltenbewusstsein von Lileath spürt die Bedrohung – und widersetzt sich nach Kräften Die Lebewesen auf dieser Welt werden zu Waffen – Waffen gegen die Chem-Pan-Sey. Giftige Pflanzen, tollwütige Tiere – sie alle sind wie Klingen in Lileaths Hand, mit denen sie gegen das Kommen von Sai'lanthresh kämpft."

languages.text: « L'esprit-monde de la lilaethan a conscience de cette menace et fait tout son possible pour lui résister. Les créatures vivantes de ce monde deviennent ses armes, des armes qui se retournent contre les mon-keigh. Plantes vénéneuses, animaux enragés... Tous sont comme une lame dans la main de la lilaethan pour combattre l'arrivée de Sai'lanthresh. »
languages.original_text: "The Lilaethan's World Spirit senses the threat — and resists as much as it is able. The living things that inhabit this world are becoming its weapons — weapons turned against the mon-keigh. Poisonous plants, rabid beasts — these are all like a blade in the Lilaethan's hand as she fights the coming of Sai'lanthresh."

traits.locale_text: « L'esprit-monde de la lilaethan a conscience de cette menace et fait tout son possible pour lui résister. Les créatures vivantes de ce monde deviennent ses armes, des armes qui se retournent contre les mon-keigh. Plantes vénéneuses, animaux enragés... Tous sont comme une lame dans la main de la lilaethan pour combattre l'arrivée de Sai'lanthresh. »

languages.text: "Lilaethan'ın Dünya Ruhu, tehdidi algılıyor ve elinden geldiğince direniyor. Bu dünyayı mesken bilen canlıları silaha çevirip mon-keighe doğrultuyor. Zehirli bitkiler, kuduz hayvanlar... Bunların bu varlıklar, Sai'lanthresh'in tezahürü ile savaşan Lilaethan'ın elinde birer kılıç gibi."
languages.original_text: "The Lilaethan's World Spirit senses the threat — and resists as much as it is able. The living things that inhabit this world are becoming its weapons — weapons turned against the mon-keigh. Poisonous plants, rabid beasts — these are all like a blade in the Lilaethan's hand as she fights the coming of Sai'lanthresh."

traits.locale_text: "Lilaethan'ın Dünya Ruhu, tehdidi algılıyor ve elinden geldiğince direniyor. Bu dünyayı mesken bilen canlıları silaha çevirip mon-keighe doğrultuyor. Zehirli bitkiler, kuduz hayvanlar... Bunların bu varlıklar, Sai'lanthresh'in tezahürü ile savaşan Lilaethan'ın elinde birer kılıç gibi."
